title: Personalized Event Recommendations
summary: As an active retiree, I want ALFRED to suggest local events and activities tailored to my interests so that I can stay socially engaged without feeling overwhelmed or monitored.

title: Simple Communication Tools for Family Engagement
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want easy-to-use communication tools to connect with my family so that I can maintain my social ties without feeling overwhelmed or monitored.

title: Reminders for Engaging Social Activities
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to remind me of social activities and events so that I can participate in family activities and maintain my social connections without feeling monitored.

title: Easy Group Activities and Family Video Calls Support
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to easily set up group activities and video calls with my family so that I can maintain my social connections without feeling overwhelmed or monitored.

title: Personalized Event Recommendations
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to suggest local events and activities based on my interests, so that I can stay socially connected and engaged without feeling overwhelmed.

title: User Engagement Feedback for Social Connectivity
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to receive feedback on my engagement with social activities, so that I can feel connected and motivated to participate without feeling monitored.

title: Cognitive Stimulation Engagement
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to access interactive games designed to challenge my mind so that I can maintain my cognitive abilities while feeling empowered and not overly monitored.

title: Personalized Event Suggestions for Social Engagement
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to suggest local events and activities based on my interests so that I can maintain social connections without feeling overwhelmed or monitored.

title: Social Engagement Suggestions
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to recommend local events and social activities based on my interests so that I can stay socially connected without feeling monitored.
